field.name: Advise mother on when to have sexual relations
To avoid sexual intercourse for at least 2 weeks after delivery, or until lochia/vaginal discharge has stopped and perineal wounds have healed
Can resume sexual intercourse after this time, whenever she feels ready and comfortable
That she is more susceptible to sexually transmitted infections during the postnatal period. Encourage her to use a condom consistently to protect against infections
